title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning      "Planning is About the Future" To anticipate the needs of the future, the National Park Service provides a variety of tools to deal with present challenges and what is on the horizon. Many of the park's planning documents are available in a digital format on this web page.Fiscal Year 2011 Annual Performance Report .pdf (48 KB)Strategic Plan 2008-2012 pdf (87 KB)General Managment Plan pdf text only (187 KB)Comprehensive Interpretive Plan .pdf text only (136 KB)  or .pdf (1.29 MB) Museum Management Plan pdf (2.42 MB)Bear Paw Battlefield Visitor Services Environmental Assessment pdf (3.6 MB)Bear Paw Battlefield Environmental Assessment Correspondence (1.53 MB)Bear Paw Battlefield Environmental Assessment Comment Extension Letter (138 KB)Bear Paw Battlefield Environmental Assessment Errata Summary of Comments (808 KB) Big Hole National Battlefield Administrative History Nez Perce National Historical Park Administrative History
